name: Penguin Pebbles
description:
Penguin Pebbles is a short platformer I made for Curdle Jam #3! It only has one level because I got a late start and didn't manage my time well enough, but atleast its playable!

Like my other two submissions, I may get around to adding more stuff someday. 

Anyways, I hope you enjoy my little game :)

I used some assets from Open Game Art in this project so check out the creator's other stuff here:

https://opengameart.org/content/8-bit-yeti

https://opengameart.org/users/ld

Credits: Lucid Design Art
